law.text: No occupational license tax for schools shall be collected from any individual who is not a resident of the school district imposing the school tax.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 461, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 12. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 24, Part III, sec. 8.
